lessons.japanese: ぼくはうっかり受話器をはずさないでダイヤルを回した。
lessons.indonesian: I forgot to lift the receiver before dialing the number.

lessons.japanese: 電話が鳴る。スーザンは受話器を取り上げる。
lessons.indonesian: The telephone rings. Susan picks it up.

lessons.japanese: 受話器から変な音がして止まらない。
lessons.indonesian: Strange noises keep coming from the receiver and won't stop.

lessons.japanese: 私は受話器を耳に当てた。
lessons.indonesian: I put the receiver to my ear.

lessons.japanese: ぼくはうっかり受話器をはずさないでダイヤルを回した。
lessons.indonesian: I forgot to lift the receiver before dialing the number.

lessons.japanese: 私は受話器を耳に当てた。
lessons.indonesian: I put the receiver to my ear.

lessons.japanese: 受話器から変な音がして止まらない。
lessons.indonesian: Strange noises keep coming from the receiver and won't stop.
